8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated that :the Messenger of Allah said: "Do not perform Wisal" They said: "But you perform Wisal O Messenger of Allah." He said: "I am not like you are, indeed my Lord feeds me and gives me to drink

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْوِصَالِ لِلصَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Wisal (Continuous) Fasting Is Disliked
